attributes.action: Ensure Employers Are present At Job Centres To Interview JSA Claimants Each Day
attributes.additional_details:
The Government should pass new laws which means any employer wanting to interview people for jobs should attend their local Job Centres and interview all people who are coming in to sign on that day. This would ensure all claimants are attending interviews each time they go into a Job Centre and would ensure someone claiming would get the job.

It should also be introduced that all JSA claimants should attend the Job Centre in formal attire, a collar and tie at least in preparation for interviews that day, as to give a good impression to the interviewer, and that they be ready to go off to other interviews should there be other employers interviewing that day.
